text:
Message 1480 of 4024
Yes. They said you are the account owner.
They can’t make changes to your account just because I said so. You are responsible for them.
You have to know that’s crazy after all the years we have been together with you in the same boat.
Don’t want to fight or trigger you please!!!
Sent:02/16/2024 at 08:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/17/2024 at 08:51 AM)
Subject:Re: Still getting alerts
Message 1481 of 4024
BTW- Why on Gods green earth would my own attorney say I beat you and my kids and will again. She suggested an RO for you, like you noted.
And when push comes to shove, we would need to be able to prove that, right? Making false allegations to obtain an RO is a really big deal in custody
fights. That’s easy research.!Both for the person saying it and any officer of the court who facilitate it.
That is why I have been asking over and over, week after week, to pull that shit back. We have discussed many times and you agreed. But then you
went to Anna Lisa and doubled down. Then proclaimed “Inal in charge Robert” I wondered why on earth you would do that when we could
peacefully resolve, but you specifically insisted on saying that crap.
At the end of the day, if you say it, you have to prove it. There is nothing to fight about. I tried to let us both back off this crazy escalation, you seemed
to agree all week and then on Friday someone else joins the party. That is why I want to talk! This stuff is bat shit crazy, and someone will find out I
don’t beat you all at some point. Because it never happened.
Your call. You said. You will prove it.
Sent:02/16/2024 at 08:13 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/17/2024 at 08:52 AM)
Subject:Re: Consequences of the RO you Filed on Me
Message 1482 of 4024
Wrapped up keys and deposit stuff this week. Please keep an eye out for a check I sent to our house so I don’t misplace it here.  Assume it will be
there mid next week for ~$1300?
Sent:02/16/2024 at 08:29 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/17/2024 at 08:51 AM)
Subject:Alki
Message 1483 of 4024
I’d rather just not talk than spend another day fighting with you. I can’t seem to do anything right I’m so tired of even trying. Hope you have a good
day. And fwiw, if pigs fly, my offer to grab decafe and consignment shop still stands. I don’t know any other way to try and break the cycle but
Sent:02/17/2024 at 01:07 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/17/2024 at 08:51 AM)
Subject:Today
